tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE building_materials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    material_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE material_specifications (
    spec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT REFERENCES building_materials(material_id),
    spec_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    spec_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE technical_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT REFERENCES building_materials(material_id),
    tech_property VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    tech_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE materials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    material_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    supplier_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE specifications (
    spec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    spec_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
)

CREATE TABLE technical_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    data_name VARCHAR(100),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MaterialSpecifications (
    spec_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    spec_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    spec_value VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES BuildingMaterials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TechnicalData (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES BuildingMaterials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaterialInventory (
    inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES BuildingMaterials(material_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);
